main event: An unidentified luminous object was observed over the Lagarfljot River in Iceland on 3 September 1954.
interesting points: The object was reported to be circular in shape, approximately 20 to 30 feet in diameter, and glowing with a white light., It hovered over the river for a few minutes before ascending vertically at a high rate of speed., The weather conditions were cloudy with good visibility during the sighting., No aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting., The sighting was corroborated by both the Reykjavik Police Dept. and the Icelandic Coast Guard.
witness description: Reykjavik Police Dept. and the Icelandic Coast Guard
